title: Synthesis and medicinal chemical characterisation of antiproliferative O,N-functionalised isopulegol derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18508-18518
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03467H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tam Minh Le, Isaac Kinyua Njangiru, Anna Vincze, István Zupkó, György T. Balogh, Zsolt Szakonyi
Benzylation of isopulegol furnished O-benzyl-protected isopulegol, which was transformed into aminodiols via epoxidation followed by ring opening of the corresponding epoxides and subsequent hydrogenolysis.
